unnormalised: Hey, sports fans! Athlete biographies are always a great read. Reminds me of that time I saw Bhaag Milkha Bhaag. Inspiring stuff! Especially like knowing where they came from, like maybe a small village near Kanpur or a sports academy like NIS Patiala. Seeing their struggle to reach the international stage is something else. Many of them come from modest backgrounds, maybe their parents were farmers or worked hard like R.K. Laxman. Such grit to reach the Olympics or win a medal, like PV Sindhu. It keeps one motivated, doesn't it?
